description: The Male Cook, Type-1-2 emoji is a sequence of the  Man,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-1-2 and  Cooking emojis. These are combined
apple_vendor_description: The man cook emoji on Apple devices is presented with a cheerful and competent demeanor, complete with a pristine white chef's hat and apron that showcase Apple's characteristic soft rounded edges and glossy highlights. Realistic lighting emphasizes the texture of his clothing and the implied warmth of the kitchen environment. This emoji symbolizes culinary skills, food preparation, or a passion for cooking, frequently used when discussing meals or restaurants.
